title: Who is prettier: Jennie Blackpink or Irene Red Velvet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly this is such a difficult question to answer, they are both the visual queens of Kpop to me personally. However I believe Irene is more classically pretty with her huge doe eyes and small jaw, there are practically no flaws in her face, she’s gorgeous. Jennie, on the other hand, has a more unique face, kind of a walking juxtaposition. Sexy because of her beautiful cat eyes and long luscious hair, but cute because of her chubby cheeks and gummy smile. I’d say in a contest, Irene would win since her beauty is more by the book, but Jennie may appeal to a larger audience because of the interest her face draws in. Personally I prefer Jennie’s face, solely because of her sexy cat eyes, I’d give anything to have eyes like that. However my current visual ranking of female Kpop idols goes like this: 3- Irene, 2- Jennie, and 1 actually goes Joy of Red Velvet! Love them all

I think Irene is prettier. Here’s why We’ve seen way more versatile looks from Irene whereas Jennie’s either she serves cute or badass, no in-between. Irene has served us a spectrum of aesthetically-pleasing visuals and looks. Irene: Femme fatale (BTW this was in one night)  Jennie: Cute-Sexy Girl (This was different occassions)  Irene: Happiness era   Jennie: Kill This Love era   Irene: Prada Girl  Jennie: Chanel Girl  Overall winner: IRENE & JENNIE BFFs   K .. Tx. Toodles!
